description: Detects the attempt to evade or obfuscate the executed command on the CommandLine using bogus path traversal
name: Command Line Path Traversal Evasion
query: (((process.executable.text:*\\Windows\\* AND process.command_line.text:(*\\..\\Windows\\* OR *\\..\\System32\\* OR *\\..\\..\\*)) OR process.command_line.text:*.exe\\..\\*) AND (NOT (process.command_line.text:(*\\Google\\Drive\\googledrivesync.exe\\..\\* OR *\\Citrix\\Virtual\ Smart\ Card\\Citrix.Authentication.VirtualSmartcard.Launcher.exe\\..\\*))))
author: Christian Burkard
